snippet.title: Toree 2 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Toree 2 is the sequel to Toree 3D.

Nintendo Switch:
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/toree-2-switch/

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1722620/Toree_2/


Itch:
https://siactro.itch.io/toree-2

- Features -
- More late 90s low poly aesthetic
- Fast gameplay, flow focused levels
- Weird elements make a comeback.
- 9 levels with unique elements
- three secret characters to unlock
- The "epic conclusion" of the ice cream arc.

PS: Yes, the trailer is 30 FPS. The game however runs at 60 FPS. Toree 2 uses a newer Unity version, and my recording hardware is old :D

#3DPlatformer #Platformer #Lowpoly #Switch #NintendoSwitch #Nintendo #PSX #HauntedPs1
